00072 #include "../gui/widget.h"

00077 class KrButton : public KrWidget
00078 {
00079   public:
00080         virtual ~KrButton();
00081 
00083         void SetTextChar( const std::string& text );
00084 
00096         void SetIcon( KrSprite* giveSprite );
00097 
00098         // Used to initialize the widget.
00099         virtual void AddedtoTree();
00100 
00101   protected:
00102         KrButton(       int width, 
00103                                 int height,
00104                                 const KrScheme& scheme );
00105 
00106         enum
00107         {
00108                 OVER = 0x01,
00109                 DOWN = 0x02,
00110 
00111                 TEXT_DEPTH = 2,
00112                 ICON_DEPTH = 1
00113         };
00114         void SetMode( int mode );
00115         void PlaceText();
00116         void PlaceIcon();
00117 
00118         int width, height, mode;
00119                 
00120   private:
00121         KrImNode          *holder;
00122         KrBoxResource *plateRes;
00123         KrBox             *plate;
00124         KrBevelElement bevel;
00125         KrSprite          *icon;
00126         int                             iconX, iconY;
00127 
00128         KrTextBox*                textBox;
00129         std::string               text;
00130 };

00143 class KrPushButton : public KrButton
00144 {
00145   public:
00146         KrPushButton(   int width, 
00147                                         int height,
00148                                         const KrScheme& scheme ) : KrButton( width, height, scheme )    {}
00149         ~KrPushButton() {}
00150 
00151         virtual int  IsMouseListener()                                          { return LEFT_MOUSE; }
00152         virtual void MouseIn( bool down, bool in );
00153         virtual void MouseMove( bool down, int x, int y );
00154         virtual void MouseClick( int down, int x, int y );
00155 
00156         // Not a key listener.
00157         // Not groupable or selectable.
00158 
00159 //      virtual bool CanAccelerate()                                            { return true; }
00160         virtual void Accelerate( bool down );
00161 };

00174 class KrToggleButton : public KrButton
00175 {
00176   public:
00177         KrToggleButton( int width, 
00178                                         int height,
00179                                         const KrScheme& scheme ) : KrButton( width, height, scheme )    {}
00180         ~KrToggleButton()       {}
00181 
00182         virtual int IsMouseListener()                                           { return LEFT_MOUSE; }
00183         virtual void MouseIn( bool down, bool in );
00184         virtual void MouseMove( bool down, int x, int y );
00185         virtual void MouseClick( int down, int x, int y );
00186 
00187         // Not a key listener.
00188 
00189         virtual bool IsSelectable()                                                     { return true; }
00190         virtual void Selected( bool selected );
00191         virtual void Accelerate( bool down );
00192 };
